edited_stories.edited_story_text: The Halloween party at my neighbor Jane's house was awesome!  There were a lot of people dressed up, especially the kids. Some of the costumes the kids from the neighborhood wore were very scary. Joey looked fantastic in his ninja costume. Max, I and the kids had a great time.  Lori had a red costume, and Bryce wore black. All the kids and adults really enjoyed themselves, even baby Joey in his little Dracula costume .
